abstract: Regulators are investigating Visa Europe to determine whether the fees it charges on cross-border transactions within the European Union break laws against price fixing.
snippet: Regulators are investigating Visa Europe to determine whether the fees it charges on cross-border transactions within the European Union break laws against price fixing.
lead_paragraph: BRUSSELS  European regulators on Wednesday opened an investigation of Visa Europe to determine whether the fees it charges on cross-border transactions within the European Union break laws against price fixing.

headline.main: Europe Starts Inquiry of Visa’s Fees
